MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA30 postcode area of Largs. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.49pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site at the Allanpark Library substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.58pm on Wednesday 10th of March 2021
